data.title: Srini Gutta on LinkedIn: Cadence Acquires Invecas to Accelerate System Realization
data.meta_description:
Cadence Design Systems Acquires #INVECAS to Accelerate System Realization

Thanks to all #INVECAS employees, customers and partners who supported us since… | 72 comments on LinkedIn
data.text:
LinkedIn and 3rd parties use essential and non-essential cookies to provide, secure, analyze and improve our Services, and to show you relevant ads (including professional and job ads) on and off LinkedIn. Learn more in our Cookie Policy.

Select Accept to consent or Reject to decline non-essential cookies for this use. You can update your choices at any time in your settings.

Cadence Design Systems Acquires #INVECAS to Accelerate System Realization Thanks to all #INVECAS employees, customers and partners who supported us since inception in 2014. Special thanks to our customers who believed in our team's ability to deliver first pass silicon and pushed us to excel in all that we have accomplished so far. Personally, its been a great learning & humble experience for me to work closely with many talented people and customers/partners worldwide in all geographies for 9 years at #INVECAS. Excited to be part of Cadence !!! Looking forward to next chapter on journey with Cadence and ways to delight our customers. https://lnkd.in/g4VCUW_q
